name: Static Fuzzy Search (Fuzzy + Index)
description: Combined plugin: generates a customizable search index at build time and provides static fuzzy search using Fuse.js. Backwards-compatible with feed.json. This plugin provides website owners with an easy way to add a fuzzy search functionality to their site. By leveraging the feed.json and fuse.js javascript library, this plugin offers a fast and reliable search experience for users, without the need for a dynamic search engine. With this plugin, site owners can quickly and easily improve the user experience and help visitors find the information they need.
author: Prashant KP & freaks-dev

messageInOptions.text: This plugin bundles Fuse.js for client-side fuzzy search. It can either use your site's JSON Feed (feed.json) or generate a custom search-index.json during site builds. If you prefer a smaller, customized index, enable the generated index in the settings. This is a third-party plugin and is not affiliated with Publii or Fuse.js. The search functionality in this plugin is powered by Fuse.js , a lightweight JavaScript library that enables fuzzy searching. The Fuse.js script is bundled within the plugin itself, meaning it is hosted alongside your website and no external requests are made. Before adjusting any search settings, please refer to the official Fuse.js documentation to understand the available configuration options. ⚙️ Setup Requirements: - Ensure that both "Search" and "Search subpage" options are enabled in your Theme settings under the Search tab. - Also, enable JSON Feed in Site Settings under the RSS/JSON Feed section. Without these settings enabled, the search feature will not function.

config.name: useFeedJson
config.label: Use feed.json (backward compatibility)
config.note: If enabled, the frontend will read the JSON feed specified below instead of the generated search-index.json.

config.name: jsonFeedUrl
config.label: JSON Feed Url
config.note: URL to the JSON feed (used only when 'Use feed.json' is enabled).

config.name: indexFileName
config.label: Generated index file name
config.note: Name/path for the generated index file on the site root (relative). Default: ./search-index.json

config.name: searchParam
config.label: Search parameter
config.note: Query parameter (like ?q=...). Change only for advanced use.

config.name: isCaseSensitive
config.label: isCaseSensitive
config.note: Indicates whether comparisons should be case sensitive

config.name: ignoreDiacritics
config.label: ignoreDiacritics
config.note: Indicates whether comparisons should ignore diacritics (accents)

config.name: includeScore
config.label: includeScore
config.note: Whether the score should be included in the result set.

config.name: includeMatches
config.label: includeMatches
config.note: Whether the matches should be included in the result set for highlighting

config.name: minMatchCharLength
config.label: minMatchCharLength
config.note: Only the matches whose length exceeds this value will be returned.

config.name: location
config.label: location
config.note: Where in the text the pattern is expected to be found

config.name: threshold
config.label: threshold
config.note: At what point does the match algorithm give up (0.0 perfect, 1.0 anything).

config.name: distance
config.label: distance
config.note: How close the match must be to the fuzzy location.

config.name: shouldSort
config.label: shouldSort
config.note: Whether to sort the results by score

config.name: findAllMatches
config.label: findAllMatches
config.note: When true, the matcher continues searching even after a perfect match

config.name: ignoreLocation
config.label: ignoreLocation
config.note: When true, search ignores location and distance

config.name: useExtendedSearch
config.label: useExtendedSearch
config.note: When true, enables extended search syntax

config.name: ignoreFieldNorm
config.label: ignoreFieldNorm
config.note: When true, ignore field-length normalization for scoring

config.name: fieldNormWeight
config.label: fieldNormWeight
config.note: How much the field-length norm affects scoring
